name: 13 Virtual School
description:
13 Virtual School, TPS Games, base on school project

Made with Unreal Engine 4 with help of Quixel Megascans Assets

Minimum System Requirement:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200 4Cores 8Threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3GB Available Space

This Project is Currently in Alpha State that we will constantly updating the game
